analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0xe319847f14624ad62a99c7eb5e6d738f61fcf185.sol:

Parameter '_owner' of EtherPaint.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/19/0xe319847f14624ad62a99c7eb5e6d738f61fcf185.sol#64-65) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of EtherPaint.dividends (/unique_chucks/19/0xe319847f14624ad62a99c7eb5e6d738f61fcf185.sol#183) is not in mixedCase
